trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Ishpeming
There were no other sightings in Ishpeming on or around August 17th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was coming home from doing my laundry, as I exited my truck I noticed a very bright light in the sky, I thought it was a star it was in the north east sky above Ishpeming Michigan.I stared at it and it was stationary then I continue to stare in odd amazement due to its brightness.As I stared it started moving first in a straight line then it seemed to start changing direction then moving faster and faster due east until it faded out of site.What seemed strange is that I stared at the thing about close to five minutes before it started moving.
Summary: Comming home from doing laundry, I observed a very bright light in the sky. I looked up thinking it was a Star then it started moving.
